net.sf.borg.ui

Class SunTrayIconProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.borg.ui.SunTrayIconProxy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Prefs.Listener

    public class SunTrayIconProxy
extends Object
implements Prefs.Listener
    communicates with the new java built-in system tray APIs
